values: 旋律；曲调；歌曲；音乐作品；和谐的状态（指乐器或声音的）
调整；调节（发动机）；调整；（给收音机、电视等）调谐；调频道；（为乐器）调音；校音

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 经调谐的；谱好曲的；调好台的
调整；调音；发出乐音（tune的过去分词）
和谐的；音调优美的；悦耳的
[电子][通信] 调谐；调音，起弦；协调一致；起音，定音

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指曲调，与配有歌词的歌曲相对。

word_group.brief_definition: 改变（对某人或某物的）看法
谁出钱谁做主, 财大者气粗
word_group.phrase: he who pays the piper calls the tune
march to the beat of a different tune
there's many a good tune played on an old fiddle
march to of a different tune

word_group.brief_definition: 与...搭调；与...在配合；与...合拍
调谐；收听（电台、节目）；使协调
微调；精细调节；细微调整

bilingual.target: 他哼着一段熟悉的曲调。

bilingual.source: The tune of this song is very beautiful.
Can you teach me the tune of this song?
bilingual.target: 你能教我这首歌的曲调吗？

bilingual.source: The tune of this song is easy to remember.
bilingual.target: 这首歌的曲调很容易记住。

bilingual.source: The bird sings a lovely tune at dawn.
bilingual.target: 那只鸟在黎明时唱歌，曲调非常优美。

bilingual.source: The tune of this piece reminds me of my childhood.
bilingual.target: 这首曲子的曲调让我想起了童年。

bilingual.source: The melodic tune of the piano filled the room.
bilingual.target: 钢琴的旋律优美的曲调充满了整个房间。

bilingual.source: The songbird's tune made the morning walk more enjoyable.
bilingual.target: 鸣禽的曲调让早晨的散步更加愉快。

bilingual.source: The whistler walked down the street, whistling a cheerful tune.
bilingual.target: 吹口哨的人沿着街道走，吹着欢快的曲调。

bilingual.source: The band played a processional tune as they marched down the street.
bilingual.target: 乐队在街上行进时演奏了一首游行的曲调。

yingyinNormal.en: I know the whiskey you like to drink. I know the tune you whistle when you're taking a piss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道你喜欢喝什么威士忌，知道你撒尿的时候吹口哨的曲调。

yingyinNormal.en: It sounded like a whistle to me. What a lovely tune. Peppa has learned how to whistle. I can whistle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听上去好像是口哨的声音。吹的曲调真好听！佩奇学会怎么吹口哨了！我会吹口哨了！

yingyinNormal.en: And then you could whistle a tune. Oh, I've got the wrong kind of mouth. Your mouth is fine. You just need to practice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 之后你就能吹出个曲调。啊，我想我肯定是嘴巴有点问题。你的嘴没有问题！你只是需要练习。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't worry. After a while, you'll tune it out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别担心，等一下你就会习惯了。

yingyinNormal.en: She can't talk. She is a fish. Of course. Maybe she'd like to hear a tune on my tuba.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她没办法说话，她是条金鱼。那当然了。说不定她很想听听我用大号演奏的曲子。

yingyinNormal.en: The other gentleman said that changing the tune was a transformation of actual content.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那位先生说，改变旋律就是改变了原曲的实际内容。

yingyinNormal.en: Merry joyful greetings best happy tune. Carol Singers. Snow is falling gently. Christmas time's here. Oh, merry Christmas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快乐与温暖的问候坚韧的致意。是圣诞颂歌队。雪轻轻的下着，圣诞节到了。哦，圣诞快乐。

yingyinNormal.en: Merry joyful greetings best happy tune. Carol Singers. Snow is falling gently. Christmas time's here. Oh, merry Christmas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快乐与温暖的问候坚韧的致意。是圣诞颂歌队。雪轻轻的下着，圣诞节到了。哦，圣诞快乐。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Daddy Pig's old accordion. I used to play this to Mummy Pig when we first met. Oh. Daddy Pig. I remember this tune.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是猪爸爸的旧手风琴。我和猪妈妈第一次见面时就是拉的手风琴。噢，猪爸爸 我记得这首曲子。

yingyinNormal.en: And so I urge you all to wake up and to tune in and to influence the genomic revolution that's happening all around you. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以我强烈期望你们所有人醒悟并参与到这场发生在你们周围的基因革命。谢谢。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 音调; 曲调; 歌曲

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a melody, especially one which characterizes a certain piece of music
sense_info_list.zh: 音调; 曲调; 歌曲

sense_info_list.en: adjust an engine so that it runs smoothly and as well as possible
adjust a musical instrument to the correct or uniform pitch
adjust a receiver circuit such as a radio or television to the frequency of the required signal
adjust or adapt something to a particular purpose or situation

word_usage.usage:
be in tune with sb./sth.表示“与……协调、一致”，如：
These proposals are perfectly in tune with our own thoughts on the subject. 
这些建议与我们在这个问题上的想法完全一致。
be out of tune with sb./sth.表示“与……不协调、不一致”，如：
He’s out of tune with modern ideas about education.
他跟现代的教育理念不合拍。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a melody, especially one which characterizes a certain piece of music

examination_example.sentence: They can distinguish a happy <highlight>tune</highlight> from a sad one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们能分辨出快乐的曲调和悲伤的曲调。

examination_example.sentence: This suggests that babies of that age can tell the difference between a happy melody and a sad <highlight>tune</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明那个年龄的婴儿可以分辨出快乐的旋律和悲伤的曲调。

sense_info_list.en: adjust an engine or balance mechanical parts so that a vehicle runs smoothly and efficiently

examination_example.sentence: During the trials, the robot algorithms (算法) and mechanics will be fine-<highlight>tuned</highlight> to make it better suited to ailing livestock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在试验过程中，将对机器人算法和力学进行微调，使其更适合生病的牲畜。

sense_info_list.en: adjust an engine so that it runs smoothly and as well as possible

exam_freq_info.chinese: 调节; 使一致; 使协调

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a melody; especially one which characterizes a certain piece of music
adjust an engine so that it runs smoothly and as well as possible
adjust or adapt something to a particular purpose or situation
sense_info_list.zh: 调节; 使一致; 使协调

examination_example.sentence: Current life structures, career paths, educational choices, and social norms are out of <highlight>tune</highlight> with the emerging reality of longer lifespans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当前的生活结构、职业道路、教育选择和社会准则都与长寿这一日益显现的现实情况格格不入。

sense_info_list.en: adjust a receiver circuit such as a radio or television to the frequency of the required signal

examination_example.sentence: "It's going to feel like a made-up conversation that people don't necessarily want to <highlight>tune</highlight> in to."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “这会感觉像是一场虚构的对话，人们不一定想收听。”

examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他又弹了另一支曲子。

examination_example.sentence: Whenever he played a new <highlight>tune</highlight>, Zhong could tell what Boya was thinking about when he played the <highlight>tune</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每当他弹奏一首新曲子时，钟子期总能感受到伯牙弹奏时的心思。

examination_example.sentence: He decided to play more <highlight>tunes</highlight> for Zhong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他决定再给钟演奏几首曲子。

sense_info_list.zh: 调音; 调整; 调频
